screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0] + 80,textsize[1] + 100) count=len(self.list) if count > 12: count=12 offset=45 * count wsizex=textsize[0] + 100 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset + 20
if (960 > wsizex): wsizex=960 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize=(wsizex - 20,45 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))#200d1940
# center window newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-wsizex)/2,(1080-wsizey)/2))

eLabel.text: F I L E L I S T
P L A Y L I S T

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=40 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=100 wsizex=textsize[0] + 180 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize=(wsizex - 20,90) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
